title: Introduction to Git
content: Git is a distributed version control system to track changes in source code.
questions: Why use Git instead of saving multiple files manually?

title: Git Basics
content: Learn about git init, git add, git commit, and git status commands.
questions: How do you commit changes in Git?

title: Branching
content: Branches allow you to work on multiple features independently.
questions: How do you create a branch?
What is the purpose of git merge?

title: Remote Repositories
content: Connect your local repository to GitHub or other remote repositories using git remote and git push.
questions: How do you clone a repository?
